name: Shapeshift Shape Shifting!
text: (This card is always treated as a "Poofers" card)./nSend 1 "Poofers" monster you control to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Poofers Poofected" monster from your Extra Deck with a different name. You can shuffle this card from your GY into the Deck; add 1 "Poofers" monster that is banished to your hand. You can only activate this effect of "Shapeshift Shape Shifting!" once per turn.
